      static ColumnFamily ColumnFamilyStore.removeDeletedColumnsOnly(ColumnFamily cf, int gcBefore, SecondaryIndexManager.Updater indexer)
      Removes only per-cell tombstones, cells that are shadowed by a row-level or range tombstone, or columns that have been dropped from the schema (for CQL3 tables only).

      This helper acts as a closure around the indexManager and updated cf data to ensure that down in Memtable's ColumnFamily implementation, the index can get updated.
